data.name: UT0001MessageFormat
data.value: Assertions should include a "because" argument explaining the reason.
data.comment: Enforces specifying a justification using the "because" parameter in assertions.

data.name: UT0001Description
data.value: FluentAssertions should always include a "because" argument to clarify the intent.

data.name: UT0002MessageFormat
data.value: The "because" value should begin with the word "because".

data.name: UT0002Description
data.value: Ensure "because" values start with "because" to improve clarity.

data.name: UT0003Title
data.value: "because" value should not end with punctuation

data.name: UT0003MessageFormat
data.value: The "because" value should not end with punctuation.

data.name: UT0003Description
data.value: Don't end "because" values with a period for better readability.
